Package mru.store.view

Class AppMenu

java.lang.Object
mru.store.view.AppMenu
public class AppMenu extends Object
The AppMenu class is used to show the menus and submenus to the user * It also prompts the user for their inputs
Version:
6.9
Author:
Caesar and Steven
